error.name: BUFFERTOOSMALL
error.description: a provided buffer is too small

error.name: COULDNOTLOADLIBRARY
error.description: the library could not be loaded

error.name: COULDNOTFINDLIBRARYEXPORT
error.description: a required exported symbol could not be found in the library

error.name: INCOMPATIBLEBINARYVERSION
error.description: the version of the binary interface does not match the bindings interface

error.name: NOSDKLIBRESOURCEDLLGIVEN
error.description: No SDK library resource DLL given

error.name: NOSDKLIBRESOURCECOMMSGIVEN
error.description: No SDK comms resource DLL given

method.name: Configure
method.description: Configures a driver with its specific configuration data.

method.name: GetName
method.description: returns the name identifier of the driver

method.name: GetType
method.description: returns the type identifier of the driver

method.name: GetVersion
method.description: returns the version identifiers of the driver

method.name: QueryParameters
method.description: Updates the driver parameters in the driver environment. Should only be called in the driver thread.

method.name: QueryParametersEx
method.description: Updates the driver parameters in the driver environment. Might be called out of thread. Implementation MUST be able to handle parallel calls.

class.name: Axis
class.description: An axis of a TML Channel.

method.name: MoveRelative
method.description: Moves the selected drive a relative distance.

method.name: MoveAbsolute
method.description: Moves the selected drive to an absolute location.

method.name: CallSubroutine
method.description: Runs a subroutine on the selected drive.

method.name: GetPosition
method.description: Retrieves the current position of the drive.

param.name: Reference
param.description: Reference type to use for the position.

method.name: GetSpeed
method.description: Retrieves the current speed of the drive.

param.name: Reference
param.description: Reference type to use for the speed.

method.name: GetIntVariable
method.description: Retrieves the current position of the drive.

method.name: MotionComplete
method.description: Checks to see if the is currently moving.

param.name: MotionComplete
param.description: Boolean reflecting if the drive is in currently moving.

method.name: TargetReached
method.description: Checks to see if the drive is in position.

param.name: TargetReached
param.description: Boolean reflecting if the drive is in position.

method.name: GetIdentifier
method.description: Returns the axis identifier.

method.name: GetChannelIdentifier
method.description: Returns the identifier of the channel of the axis.

method.name: SetPower
method.description: Sets the power for an axis.

param.name: Enable
param.description: Flag if the power is enabled or not enabled.

method.name: ReadRegister
method.description: Reads the selected register of an axis.

method.name: CheckPower
method.description: Checks the power of the selected axis.

method.name: CheckAxisError
method.description: Checks for any errors on the selected axis, ignores limits.

method.name: ResetAxis
method.description: Resets the selected axis, homing will be required.

param.name: ForceFull
param.description: To set if a full or just fault reset is run (false=faultreset, true=fullreset).

class.name: Channel
class.description: A Channel of a TML Connection.

method.name: GetIdentifier
method.description: Returns the channel identifier.

method.name: SetupAxis
method.description: Setups an axis for this channel. The identifier MUST be globally unique.

param.name: Identifier
param.description: Identifier for the axis. Fails if axis already exist.

param.name: AxisID
param.description: Hardware ID of the axis. MUST be unique in the channel.

param.name: Configuration
param.description: Configuration ZIP file for the axis.

param.name: CountsPerMM
param.description: Sets the mm per count used for all moves and accelerations.

method.name: FindAxis
method.description: Finds an existing axis of this channel.

param.name: Identifier
param.description: Identifier for the axis. Fails if axis already exist.

method.name: AxisExists
method.description: Returns if the axis exists on this channel.

method.name: Close
method.description: Closes the channel. Any other call will fail after closing.

class.name: Driver_TML
class.description: A Driver for the Technosoft Motion Library SDK.

method.name: SetToSimulationMode
method.description: Turns the driver into a simulation mode.

method.name: IsSimulationMode
method.description: Returns if the driver is in simulation mode.

param.name: SimulationModeEnabled
param.description: Flag if driver is in simulation mode.

method.name: SetCustomSDKResource
method.description: Sets the machine resource name of the TML SDK to load. MUST be called before Connect or it has no effect.

param.name: LibResourceName
param.description: Resource name of core machine package that contains the proprietary tml_lib.dll. Empty means standard naming applies.

param.name: CommsResourceName
param.description: Resource name of core machine package that contains the proprietary tmlcomms.dll. Empty means standard naming applies.

method.name: OpenChannel
method.description: Opens a communication channel.

method.name: ChannelExists
method.description: Returns if the channel exists..

method.name: FindChannel
method.description: Find a communication channel by integer. Fails if the channel does not exist.

method.name: GetVersion
method.description: retrieves the binary version of this library.

param.name: Major
param.description: returns the major version of this library

param.name: Minor
param.description: returns the minor version of this library

param.name: Micro
param.description: returns the micro version of this library

method.name: GetLastError
method.description: Returns the last error recorded on this object

param.name: HasError
param.description: Is there a last error to query

method.name: ReleaseInstance
method.description: Releases shared ownership of an Instance

method.name: AcquireInstance
method.description: Acquires shared ownership of an Instance

method.name: InjectComponent
method.description: Injects an imported component for usage within this component

param.name: SymbolAddressMethod
param.description: Address of the SymbolAddressMethod of the injected component

method.name: GetSymbolLookupMethod
method.description: Returns the address of the SymbolLookupMethod

method.name: CreateDriver
method.description: Creates a driver instance with a specific name.

param.name: Name
param.description: Name of driver to be created.

param.name: Type
param.description: Type of driver to be created.
